simple.escp.data

Class BeanDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.data.BeanDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource

    public class BeanDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    A BeanDataSource is a DataSource that obtains its value from a Java Bean object.

      Create a new BeanDataSource.

        Parameters:
        methodName - search for this method's name.
        Returns:
        a MethodDescriptor or null if this data source doesn't have the specified method name.

        Returns:

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String member)
                     throws InvalidPlaceholder
        Retrieve value for a member from this DataSource.
        Specified by:
        get in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        member - the member that will be retrieved. This DataSource must have the specified member.
        Returns:
        an object that represent the member value.
        Throws:
        InvalidPlaceholder - if member doesn't exists or can't retrieve the member value.
